comments.author: ryan.porter
comments.text:
Establish the Korporus monorepo with the workspace structure, shared tooling, and Module Federation configuration needed for all subsequent work.

This epic produces no user-visible functionality. It creates the foundation: a working monorepo where multiple apps can be built, a shared Module Federation configuration pattern, and a Web Component wrapper utility that all apps will use to expose their views as custom elements.

### Children
- Task 1.1: Initialize the Korporus monorepo
- Task 1.2: Create the Web Component wrapper utility (depends on 1.1)
- Task 1.3: Define the app manifest schema (depends on 1.1, parallel with 1.2)
